segments.text: Good afternoon . “ ginger ’ s restaurant ” . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ d like to book a table for Friday evening please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ ll be eight or nine people . Could we book a private room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll just check . At what time on Friday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . That ’ s fine . We can book you a private room for up to ten people at that time . Could you give me your name please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Jenkins . My phone number is 7539738 2 . that ’ s confirmed then . 7 thirty on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Do you intend to order a Lacarne or will you be having our seafood buffet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , we ’ d like the buffet please . We ’ Ve heard it ’ s very good .
segments.speaker: S2
